entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:24 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 12:35 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
